name: Local Develop
discription: A local develop configuration for testing

topics.name: system_admin_heartbeat
topics.description: This is the topic where the admin tool publishes his heartbeat, indicating that the admin tool is up.

topics.name: system_heartbeat
topics.description: This is the topic where every solution published the heartbeat indicating that the solution is up and alive.

topics.name: system_logging
topics.description: This is the topic where every solution published the logs to be stored in the admin tool log table.

topics.name: system_evaluation_logging
topics.description: This is the topic where every solution published the evaluation logs to be stored in the admin tool log table.

topics.name: system_topic_access_invite
topics.description: This is the topic where every solution gets his information to which topics he is invited to join.

topics.name: system_topic_create_request
topics.description: This is the topic where every solution can request topic creation and sending invite message.

topics.name: system_topic_remove_request
topics.description: This is the topic where every solution can request topic(s) to be remove.

topics.name: system_topic_remove
topics.description: This is the topic where every solution get informed that a topic is going to be removed!

topics.name: system_timing
topics.description: This is the topic where every solution gets the actual testbed time.

topics.name: system_timing_control
topics.description: This is the topic where every solution gets the actual testbed trial time control.

topics.name: system_tm_phase_message
topics.description: This is the topic to manage the trial phases.

topics.name: system_tm_role_player
topics.description: This is the topic to share role player messages.

topics.name: system_tm_session_mgmt
topics.description: This is the topic to share session mgmt messages.

topics.name: system_observer_tool_answer
topics.description: This is the topic where the OST sends the Observer answers to the AAR.

topics.name: system_request_change_of_trial_stage
topics.description: This is the topic where every solution gets the actual testbed trial time control.
